lead_paragraph: The request of Nelson Peterson, the father of the Oklahoma junior tailback Adrian Peterson, to attend the Sooners’ game against Texas in Dallas on Oct. 7 has been denied by federal probation officials. The elder Peterson, 43, pleaded guilty to laundering money obtained from the distribution of crack cocaine in 1999 and is scheduled to be released from an Oklahoma City halfway house Oct. 5.
